meaning: A lover of something.
example: The contest is only open to amateurs.

meaning: A minister of the highest rank sent to a foreign court to represent there his sovereign or country. (Sometimes called ambassador-in-residence)
example: As front hall porter, you are an ambassador for the hotel.

meaning: (of a person or their character) Having or showing ambition; wanting a lot of power, honor, respect, superiority, or other distinction.
example: an ambitious person

meaning: Pleasantness.
example: We especially enjoyed the amenity of the climate on our last holiday.

meaning: Large; great in size, extent, capacity, or bulk; for example spacious, roomy or widely extended.
example: an ample house

meaning: To entertain or occupy in a pleasant manner; to stir with pleasing emotions.
example: I watch these movies because they amuse me.

meaning: Again, once more; afresh, in a new way, newly.
example: Each morning, opportunity—like the sun—dawns anew.

meaning: A day that is an exact number of years (to the day) since a given significant event occurred. Often preceded by an ordinal number indicating the number of years.
example: Today is the fiftieth anniversary of the end of the war.

meaning: One who makes announcements.
A feeling of discomfort or vexation caused by what one dislikes.
example: Marc loved his sister, but when she annoyed him he wanted to switch her off.

meaning: Once every year without fail, yearly
A grotesque representation of a figure; a gargoyle.
(manner) In any way or manner whatever.
example: Anyhow, he is dead now.

meaning: Suitable for any time; not associated with any particular time.
An expression of remorse or regret for having said or done something that harmed another: an instance of apologizing (saying that one is sorry).
example: The CEO made a public apology for the scandal, and promised full cooperation with the authorities.

meaning: Something attached to something else; an attachment or accompaniment.
A small, light, and usually savory first course in a meal
A common, round fruit produced by the tree Malus domestica, cultivated in temperate climates.
An implement, an instrument or apparatus designed (or at least used) as a means to a specific end (often specified), especially:
Suitable for application, relevant
One who applies for something; one who makes a request; a petitioner.
example: Our job advertisement attracted seven applicants.

meaning: The act or process of developing an opinion of value.
A fair valuation or estimate of merit, worth, weight, etc.; recognition of excellence.
example: We give to you this trophy as a token of our appreciation of all your years of service.

meaning: Anticipating something with anxiety or fear.
A trainee, especially in a skilled trade.
example: He was apprenticed to a local employer.

meaning: To estimate.
example: NASA's Genesis spacecraft has on board an ion monitor to record the speed, density, temperature and approximate composition of the solar wind ions.

meaning: That part of a circle which a heavenly body appears to pass through as it moves above and below the horizon.
A professional who designs buildings or other structures, or who prepares plans and superintends construction.
example: Plato made the causes of things to be matter, ideas, and an efficient architect.

meaning: Pertaining to architecture.
A place for storing earlier, and often historical, material. An archive usually contains documents (letters, records, newspapers, etc.) or other types of media kept for historical interest.
example: His archive of Old High German texts is the most extensive in Britain.

meaning: Having or revealing creative skill.
In a state of sleep; also, broadly, resting.
example: I was asleep when you called.

meaning: Any specific feature, part, or element of something.
example: Japan's aging population is an important aspect of its economy.

meaning: To put together.
example: He assembled the model ship.

meaning: A set of pieces that work together in unison as a mechanism or device.
example: In order to change the bearing, you must first remove the gearbox assembly.

meaning: The act of assigning; the allocation of a job or a set of tasks.
example: This flow chart represents the assignment of tasks in our committee.

meaning: The act of assuring; a declaration tending to inspire full confidence; that which is designed to give confidence.
example: his assurance is intolerable

meaning: Having to do with athletes.
example: Are you a member of the American Athletic Association?

meaning: To gain (an object or desired result).
example: To attain such a high level of proficiency requires hours of practice each day.

meaning: One who attends; one who works with or watches over something.
example: Give your keys to the parking attendants and they will park your car for you.

meaning: A person who is in attendance or in the audience of an event.
(clothing) One's dress; what one wears; one's clothes.
example: He stood there, attired in his best clothes, waiting for applause.

meaning: A lawyer; one who advises or represents others in legal matters as a profession.
A public event where goods or property are sold to the highest bidder.
A judicial examination.
example: National Assembly audit

meaning: A performance, by an aspiring performer, to demonstrate suitability or talent.
example: I've been to five auditions this week.

meaning: One who audits bookkeeping accounts.
A large room for public meetings or performances.
Of the same origin as claimed; genuine.
example: The experts confirmed it was an authentic signature.

meaning: The power to enforce rules or give orders.
example: I have the authority to penalise the staff in my department, but not the authority to sack them.

meaning: Permission.
example: I've got authorization. Call the office and you'll see.

meaning: To grant (someone) the permission or power necessary to do (something).
example: The General Assembly authorized the Council to take up the matter.

meaning: An automobile.
example: My brother is an auto mechanic.

meaning: To replace or enhance human labor with machines.
example: Many offices still need to automate.

meaning: A car with automatic transmission.
example: I never learned to drive a stick. I can only drive an automatic.

meaning: A type of vehicle designed to move on the ground under its own stored power and intended to carry a driver, a small number of additional passengers, and a very limited amount of other load. A car or motorcar.
A shop or company that sells motor vehicle parts
The quality of being available.
example: What is your availability this week?

meaning: A waiting for; ambush.
example: I await your reply to my letter.
